## ğŸ” Find by Task

### "I need to..."

#### ...implement a feature
â†’ **Backend Developer** (logic) + **Frontend Developer** (UI)

#### ...set up infrastructure
â†’ **DevOps Engineer**

#### ...audit compliance
â†’ **Legal/Compliance** + **Security Engineer**

#### ...test the application
â†’ **QA Engineer** + specialist (frontend/performance/security)

#### ...design UI/UX
â†’ **UI Expert** + **UX Expert**

#### ...review architecture
â†’ **Tech Lead** (+ other specialists as needed)

#### ...integrate with ERP
â†’ **Stakeholder ERP** + **Backend Developer**

#### ...manage product roadmap
â†’ **Product Owner** + **Tech Lead**

#### ...triage GitHub issues
â†’ **Support Triage**

#### ...implement AI features
â†’ **AI Specialist** + **Backend Developer**
